verses.verse: The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea.<s%> As <S%H5492>whirlwinds<s%> in the <S%H5045>South<s%> <S%H2498>sweep<s%> <S%H935>through,<s%> it comes from the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> from an <S%H3372>awesome<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%>

A <S%H7186>grievous<s%> <S%H2380>vision<s%> is <S%H5046>declared<s%> to <S%H898>me.<s%> The treacherous man deals <S%H898>treacherously,<s%> and the <S%H7703>destroyer<s%> <S%H7703>destroys.<s%> Go <S%H5927>up,<s%> <S%H5867>Elam;<s%> <S%H6696>attack!<s%> I have <S%H7673>stopped<s%> all of <S%H4074>Media<s%>'s <S%H585>sighing.<s%>

Therefore my <S%H4975>thighs<s%> are <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H2479>anguish.<s%> <S%H2479>Pains<s%> have taken <S%H270>hold<s%> on <S%H6735>me,<s%> like the pains of a woman in <S%H3205>labor.<s%> I am in so much <S%H5753>pain<s%> that I <S%H8085>can't<s%> hear. I so am <S%H926>dismayed<s%> that I <S%H7200>can't<s%> see.

My <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H8582>flutters.<s%> <S%H6427>Horror<s%> has <S%H1204>frightened<s%> <S%H5399>me.<s%> The twilight that I <S%H2837>desired<s%> has been <S%H7760>turned<s%> into trembling for <S%H2731>me.<s%>

They <S%H6186>prepare<s%> the <S%H7979>table.<s%> They <S%H6186>set<s%> the <S%H6822>watch.<s%> They <S%H398>eat.<s%> They <S%H8354>drink.<s%> <S%H6965>Rise<s%> <S%H8269>up,<s%> you princes, <S%H4886>oil<s%> the <S%H4043>shield!<s%>
For the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3212>me,<s%> "Go, <S%H5975>set<s%> a <S%H6822>watchman.<s%> Let him <S%H5046>declare<s%> what he <S%H7200>sees.<s%>

When he <S%H7200>sees<s%> a <S%H7393>troop,<s%> <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> in <S%H6776>pairs,<s%> a <S%H7393>troop<s%> of <S%H2543>donkeys,<s%> a <S%H7393>troop<s%> of <S%H1581>camels,<s%> he shall <S%H7181>listen<s%> <S%H7182>diligently<s%> with <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H7182>attentiveness.<s%>"

He <S%H7121>cried<s%> like a <S%H738>lion:<s%> <S%H136>"Lord,<s%> I <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> on the <S%H4707>watchtower<s%> in the <S%H3119>daytime,<s%> and every <S%H3915>night<s%> I <S%H5324>stay<s%> at my <S%H4931>post.<s%>

<S%H935>Behold,<s%> here comes a <S%H7393>troop<s%> of <S%H376>men,<s%> <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> in <S%H6776>pairs.<s%>" He <S%H6030>answered,<s%> <S%H5307>"Fallen,<s%> <S%H5307>fallen<s%> is <S%H894>Babylon;<s%> and all the engraved <S%H6456>images<s%> of her <S%H430>gods<s%> are <S%H7665>broken<s%> to the <S%H776>ground.<s%>

You are my <S%H4098>threshing,<s%> and the <S%H1121>grain<s%> of my <S%H1637>floor!<s%>" That which I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> I have declared to <S%H5046>you.<s%>

The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H1746>Dumah.<s%> One <S%H7121>calls<s%> to me out of <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> <S%H8104>"Watchman,<s%> what of the <S%H3915>night?<s%> <S%H8104>Watchman,<s%> what of the <S%H3915>night?<s%>"

The <S%H8104>watchman<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H857>comes,<s%> and also the <S%H3915>night.<s%> If you will <S%H1158>inquire,<s%> <S%H1158>inquire.<s%> <S%H857>Come<s%> back <S%H7725>again.<s%>"
The <S%H4853>burden<s%> on <S%H6152>Arabia.<s%> In the <S%H3293>forest<s%> in <S%H6152>Arabia<s%> you will <S%H3885>lodge,<s%> you <S%H736>caravans<s%> of <S%H1720>Dedanites.<s%>

They <S%H857>brought<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H7125>him<s%> who was <S%H6771>thirsty.<s%> The <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8485>Tema<s%> <S%H6923>met<s%> the <S%H5074>fugitives<s%> with their <S%H3899>bread.<s%>

For they <S%H5074>fled<s%> away <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H2719>swords,<s%> <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H5203>drawn<s%> <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H1869>bent<s%> <S%H7198>bow,<s%> and <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H3514>heat<s%> of <S%H4421>battle.<s%>

For the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8141>me,<s%> "Within a year, as a worker bound by <S%H7916>contract<s%> would <S%H8141>count<s%> <S%H3519>it,<s%> all the glory of <S%H6938>Kedar<s%> will <S%H3615>fail,<s%>

and the <S%H7605>residue<s%> of the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H7198>archers,<s%> the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6938>Kedar,<s%> will be <S%H4591>few;<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> has spoken <S%H1696>it.<s%>"
